fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Premonition: You will passively know what cards you'll draw next.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Favors: Choose a non-special card that all Chaos members will draw this phase. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Dispel: Choose a non-duel won card. That card can no longer be drawn. [1 use, Unique, UOR2]
- Fake: Choose a card a player will draw this phase. It will appear normal, but is actually a Fake? [Infinite uses, 2 CD]
Fake? - When you play this disguised card, nothing actually happens and instead gain 1 Bleeding, 1 Burning, and 1 Poisoned instantly.
